fields.label: System ID
fields.tooltip: System ID, information from SNMP agent

fields.label: System Name
fields.tooltip: System Name, information from SNMP agent

fields.label: System Location
fields.tooltip: System Location, information from SNMP agent

fields.label: System Contact
fields.tooltip: System Contact, information from SNMP agent

fields.label: System Description
fields.tooltip: System Description, information from SNMP agent

fields.label: Description
fields.tooltip: Description of the device's purpose (E.G. Core P2P Router, Egress Internet Router, Etc.)

fields.label: Category
fields.tooltip: This column is to be used to specify what category of Network Element this device would fall into (E.G. WAN Router, Firewall, Etc.). Expected only Alphanumeric, '-' and '_'.

fields.label: Manufacturer
fields.tooltip: Manufacturer - Self explanatory

fields.label: Model Number
fields.tooltip: Model number of the device (E.G. Cisco 3845, Oki B4400, Etc.)

fields.label: Serial Number
fields.tooltip: Serial Number

fields.label: Asset Number
fields.tooltip: This field should be used if the organization employs asset tags for inventory purposes

fields.label: Date Installed
fields.tooltip: A handy dandy place to keep the date this equipment went into service, just in case the bean counters or your boss ask you for any particulars on this device

fields.label: Operating System
fields.tooltip: Operating System

fields.label: Display Category
fields.tooltip: This column is to be used to specify what category of Network Element this device would fall into (E.G. WAN Router, Firewall, Etc.). Expected only Alphanumeric, '-' and '_'.

fields.label: Notification Category
fields.tooltip: This could be something like 'serverAdmin' or 'networkAdmin' to be used in filter rules for directing notifications. Expected only Alphanumeric, '-' and '_'.

fields.label: Poller Category
fields.tooltip: This is to be used in filter rules to define devices in a particular poller package. Expected only Alphanumeric, '-' and '_'.

fields.label: Threshold Category
fields.tooltip: This is to be used in filter rules to define devices in a particular thresholding package. Expected only Alphanumeric, '-' and '_'.

fields.label: State
fields.tooltip: Continuation of address

fields.label: Region
fields.tooltip: On a geographically or otherwise determined regional basis

fields.label: Address 1
fields.tooltip: Street address of this device (For technician dispatch)

fields.label: Address 2
fields.tooltip: Continuation of address

fields.label: City
fields.tooltip: Continuation of address

fields.label: ZIP
fields.tooltip: Postal code (ZIP code)

fields.label: Country
fields.tooltip: Country

fields.label: Longitude
fields.tooltip: Geo Longitude

fields.label: Latitude
fields.tooltip: Geo Latitude

fields.label: Division
fields.tooltip: Standard corporate mumbo jumbo for the bean counters getting ever more granular on where money gets spent. Populate as you fee fit, or as dictated.

fields.label: Department
fields.tooltip: More of the above, but more simple (E.G. Accounting, Collections, IT, Etc.)

fields.label: Building
fields.tooltip: If this address is part of a complex/campus, this field allows additional granularity.

fields.label: Floor
fields.tooltip: Floor on which this node is located, for technician dispatch.

fields.label: Room
fields.tooltip: Room number where this node is located, for technician dispatch

fields.label: Rack
fields.tooltip: This field should be used to designate the rack in specific that this piece of equipment is located in at a given location (E.G. Server3; Network5; Isle C-Bay5;105.12, Etc.) preferably by using both Bay & Isle coordinates

fields.label: Rack unit height
fields.tooltip: Rack unit height of node: 1, 2, 3, ...

fields.label: Slot
fields.tooltip: This field should be used to designate what slot in a chassis/shelf this node occupies

fields.label: Port
fields.tooltip: Port on a given card or device being monitored

fields.label: Circuit ID
fields.tooltip: This field should contain the Circuit ID of the ISP/Carrier's designation to which this equipment terminates a connection. For DSL a phone number (or whatever identifying charistic of the LEC should be populated here) to this device's Voice or Data egress.

fields.label: Admin
fields.tooltip: Admin contact at the given location

fields.label: CPU
fields.tooltip: Type of CPU in this node

fields.label: RAM
fields.tooltip: RAM

fields.label: Additional Hardware
fields.tooltip: Additional Hardware

fields.label: Number of Power Supplies
fields.tooltip: Number of power supplies (numeric value expected)

fields.label: Input Power
fields.tooltip: Input power 'type' (numeric value expected)

fields.label: Storage Controller
fields.tooltip: Storage Controller

fields.label: HDD 1
fields.tooltip: Hard disk drive information

fields.label: HDD 2
fields.tooltip: Hard disk drive information

fields.label: HDD 3
fields.tooltip: Hard disk drive information

fields.label: HDD 4
fields.tooltip: Hard disk drive information

fields.label: HDD 5
fields.tooltip: Hard disk drive information

fields.label: HDD 6
fields.tooltip: Hard disk drive information

fields.label: Username
fields.tooltip: Username

fields.label: Password
fields.tooltip: Password

fields.label: Enable Password
fields.tooltip: Enable Password: used only if AutoEnable is not set to 'A'

fields.label: Connection
fields.tooltip: Connection

fields.label: Auto Enable
fields.tooltip: Whether the provided authentication user goes directly into 'enable' mode on this node upon login.

fields.label: SNMP Community
fields.tooltip: SNMP Community String (it is recommended to use snmp-config.xml instead)

fields.label: Name
fields.tooltip: Vendor who provides service for this device (If applicable, E.G. ISP, Local PBX Maintenance vendor, etc.)

fields.label: Phone
fields.tooltip: Phone number of vendor that services (or provides service to) this equipment (E.G. ISP, PBX Vendor, Phone company, etc.)

fields.label: Fax
fields.tooltip: Fax number of the above vendor

fields.label: Lease
fields.tooltip: A nice spot to populate the name of the leasing company or lease ID for this equipment

fields.label: Lease Expires
fields.tooltip: If all goes according to plan, this should be a date after you’ve got new equipment commissioned to take over for the service this equipment provides

fields.label: Vendor Asset Number
fields.tooltip: If the vendor that supplies this equipment uses a asset tag of their own, populate that data here

fields.label: Contract Number
fields.tooltip: Number / ID of maintenance contract

fields.label: Contract Expires
fields.tooltip: Date when maintenance contract expires

fields.label: Maint Phone
fields.tooltip: Phone number for technical operational support for the device in question (Think Helpdesk, Phone Company, ISP NOC, Etc.)

fields.label: VMware managed object ID
fields.tooltip: Internal id in VMware vCenter

fields.label: VMware managed entity type
fields.tooltip: Defines a VMware host system or virtual machine

fields.label: VMware management server
fields.tooltip: VMware vCenter host

fields.label: VMware state
fields.tooltip: VMware managed entity state

fields.label: VMware Topology Info
fields.tooltip: VMware topology information

fields.label: Comment
fields.tooltip: Comments for this asset
